sec.p: Additional Supporting Information may be found in the online version of this article:
Table S1. Annual models of renesting probability (1995–2011).
Table S2. Correlation coefficients between weather variables (1995–2011).
Table S3. Range and temporal trends in weather variables (1968–2011).
Table S4. Estimates of annual and stage-specific predation intensity (1995–2011).
Appendix S1. Methods used to assess the seasonal pattern of caterpillar abundance (2009–2012).
